text: @NikkiHaley Then why are we bailing out corporations that have made billions in profits every quarter? Shouldn't they have a few billion tucked away for a "rainy day?" Don't be a hypocrite. #BailoutHumansNow #COVID19 #PeopleBeforeProfit
